page.title: 19Home Life in Mark
page.content: I live in a village called{Mark.}When I need to go to the shop, I have to go on my bicycle because it is about 1.5 miles away. I spend a lot of time in the shop because it sells everything- books,food,toys,sweets,make-up and fruit. On my way home I pass the local pub. Sometimes I go into the children's room with my friends or play skittles while our parents have a drink. Most days when I get home from school, if it is hot, my friends and I go swimming. I go to my Gran's every day because she only lives next door. I have 2 rabbits and 2 gerbils which I feed twice a day. I enjoy cycling around Mark,it is lovely. Our class from school went on a 6 mile cycle ride around Mark to survey it. We visited the Vicar and he showed us round the Church and Vicarage. We saw people selling fruit,flowers & vegs.
